div.ab:
ــه كپاپپ كاتب ك
اثــنا عشر فدّانا ونصف
باثنا عشر دينارا ونــصف وازنة مثاله مثاقيل
في طــبول مع خراج سنة
ثماـن وسبعــين ومائة وضريبتها على ما يأتــي
من تــوزيع الأمــير حــــفظه اللّه برا عمّا لما سنة
ثمان وسبعين ومــــائة وكتب فى ست
مضين من رمضان ســــنة ثمان ـوـســبعين ومائة
فدّان بـدينر
‫فذلك ‪ιβχ ιβχ

*** *****
***h kBʾBB kātib *** k
*** ĭṯnā ʿašara faddān:an wa niṣf:un
bi ĭṯnā ʿašara dīnār:an wa niṣfi niṣf:in wāzinaẗi wāzinaẗ:in miṯāla maṯāqīla hu
*** fī ṭubūl:in maʿa ḫarāǧi sanaẗi
ṯamān:in wa sabʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in wa ḍarībaẗi hā ʿalà mā yaʾtī
min tawzīʿi ăl ʾamīri ḥafiẓa hu ăl lāhu barāʾ:an ʿammā li māʾi sanaẗi
ṯamān:in wa sabʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in wa kutiba fī sitt:in
maḍayna min ramaḍāni sanaẗi ṯamān:in wa sabʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
** *** ***
faddān:un bi dīnār:in
fa ḏālika 12+1/2 12+1/2

.........................]-secretary [............]k
[... tw]elve and a half faddâns [... twe]lve faddans and a half
[for twelve and a ha]lf dînârs of full weight the equivalent of which [for twelve dinars and a h]alf of the full weight of the weight measures
... in the re]gisters together with the kharāj of the year [is ...... by instal]ments together with the impost of the year
eigh[t and seve]nty and one [hundre]d and its tax in crops according to what [com]es one [hun]dred and [seven]ty eigh[t] and its corn-tax according to what come[s]
from the ap[portionment of the gover]nor, may God protect him, removed from what is due for water of the year of the ap[portionment by the Gover]nor - may God protect him - save what is due for water for the year
eight and seventy and one hundred. It was written when six (i.e., nights) one hundred and seventy eight, and (it) was written when six (nights)
had passed of ramaḍan of the year eight [and seventy one hundred]. had passed of the Ramaḍân of the y[ea]r one hundred [and se]venty eight.
faddan for dinar faddân for dînâr(s)
that is 12 1/2 12 1/2 This is 12 1/2 12 1/2
